name: Immortals Must Die
storyline: Dying is part of the job. Prepare to die a lot in this game, but always in a rewarding way. Each time you die, you learn more about the game mechanics, unlock new stuff and spend what you've collected to get stronger. Collect all 5 seals to save yourself from the uncertain future.
summary:
Indie Roquelite 2d

Kill hordes of demons as you unlock new items and skills, complete quests, upgrade your equipment and discover different ways of getting through the challenges that await you.
